00043 class tx_servicemgr_pi5 extends tx_servicemgr {
00044     var $prefixId      = 'tx_servicemgr_pi5';               // Same as class name
00045     var $scriptRelPath = 'pi5/class.tx_servicemgr_pi5.php'; // Path to this script relative to the extension dir.
00046     var $extKey        = 'servicemgr';                      // The extension key.
00047     var $pi_checkCHash = true;

00056     function main($content,$conf)   {
00057         $this->conf=$conf;
00058         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00059 
00060         $this->tx_init();
00061         $this->tx_loadLL();
00062         $this->userID = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->fe_user->user[uid];
00063         $this->ts = mktime(0,0,0);
00064         $this->fetchConfigValue('viewmode');
00065         
00066         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->debugOutput = true;
00067         
00068         if ($this->piVars['submit']) {
00069             $this->doSubmit($this->piVars['submittype']);
00070         }
00071         
00072         switch ($this->conf['viewmode']) {
00073             CASE 'personal':
00074                 $content = $this->personalView($this->userID);
00075                 break;
00076             CASE 'leader':
00077                 break;
00078             CASE 'list':
00079             default:
00080                 $content = $this->listView();
00081         }
00082         
00083         return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00084     }
00085     
00092     function personalView($userID) {
00093         
00094         $user = $this->getUserData(intval($userID));
00095         
00096         if (!empty($user['usergroup'])) {
00097             $teamsAndWhere = ' AND uid in ('.$user['usergroup'].')';
00098         }
00099         
00100         $teams = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTgetRows('uid,title,tx_servicemgr_dsname',
00101                     'fe_groups', 'deleted=0 AND tx_servicemgr_dutyschedule=1'.$teamsAndWhere);
00102         
00103         $events = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTgetRows('uid,subject,datetime,requiredteams,notes,notes_internal',
00104                     'tx_servicemgr_events', 'deleted=0 AND hidden=0 AND dutyscheduleopen=1 AND datetime>'.$this->ts, '', 'datetime ASC');
00105         
00106         $eventInfo = array('datetime','subject','notes','notes_internal');
00107         
00108         $data = array();
00109         $data[] = array_merge(
00110             $this->getEventHeaders(),
00111             array(array('&nbsp;','dutyschedule-spacer')),
00112             $this->getTeamHeaders($teams)
00113         );
00114         
00115         foreach ($events as $event) {
00116             $duty = $this->getSingleSchedule($event['uid']);
00117                         
00118             $cellData = $this->getEventInformation($event,$eventInfo);
00119             $cellData[] = array('&nbsp;','dutyschedule-spacer');
00120 
00121             //Set data for each cell/team
00122             foreach ($teams as $team) {
00123                 $temp['duty'] = array();
00124                 if (!is_array($duty[$team['uid']])) {
00125                     $temp['duty'][] = '<input type="checkbox" value="'.$user['uid'].'" name="tx_servicemgr_pi5[dutydata]['.$event['uid'].']['.$team['uid'].']" />';
00126                 } else {
00127                     
00128                     if (in_array($user['uid'],$duty[$team['uid']])) {
00129                         $temp['duty'][] = '<input type="checkbox" value="'.$user['uid'].'" name="tx_servicemgr_pi5[dutydata]['.$event['uid'].']['.$team['uid'].']" checked="checked" />';
00130                     } else {
00131                         $temp['duty'][] = '<input type="checkbox" value="'.$user['uid'].'" name="tx_servicemgr_pi5[dutydata]['.$event['uid'].']['.$team['uid'].']" />';
00132                     }
00133                     
00134                     foreach ($duty[$team['uid']] as $key => $value) {
00135                         if ($value != $user['uid']) {
00136                             $temp['duty'][] = $team['members'][$value]['first_name'];
00137                         }
00138                     }
00139                 }
00140                 
00141                 $cellData[] = array(
00142                     implode(', ',$temp['duty']),
00143                     $this->getCssClass($event['requiredteams'],$team),
00144                 );
00145                 
00146             }
00147             
00148             $data[] = $cellData;
00149         }
00150         
00151         $actionLink = $this->cObj->typoLink_URL(array(
00152             'parameter' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00153             'addQueryString' => 1,
00154             'addQueryString.' => array(
00155                 'exclude' => 'cHash,no_cache',
00156             ),
00157             'additionalParams' => '&no_cache=1',
00158             'useCacheHash' => false,
00159         ));
00160         
00161         $content = '<form method="post" action="'.$actionLink.'">'; 
00162         $content .= $this->setData2Template($data);
00163         $content .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[submittype]" value="personal" />';
00164         $content .= '<div style="float:right;"><input type="submit" name="'.$this->prefixId.'[submit]" value="'.$this->pi_getLL('submitform').'" /></div><div class="clear"></div>';
00165         $content .= '</form>';
00166         
00167         return $content;
00168     }
00169     
00176     function getUserData($feuser_uid) {
00177         //get content from database
00178         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00179             'uid, username, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, school, grade, showname, family, image, usergroup',   #select
00180             'fe_users', #from
00181             'deleted=0 and uid='.$feuser_uid  #where
00182         );
00183 
00184         if ($res) {
00185             $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00186             return $row;
00187         } else {
00188             return false;
00189         }
00190     }

00197     function listView() {
00198                 
00199         $teams = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTgetRows('uid,title,tx_servicemgr_dsname',
00200                     'fe_groups', 'deleted=0 AND tx_servicemgr_dutyschedule=1');
00201         
00202         
00203         $events = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTgetRows('uid,subject,datetime,requiredteams,notes,notes_internal',
00204                     'tx_servicemgr_events', 'deleted=0 AND hidden=0', '', 'datetime ASC');
00205         
00206         $eventInfo = array('datetime','subject','notes','notes_internal');
00207         
00208         
00209         $data = array();
00210         $data[] = array_merge(
00211             $this->getEventHeaders(),
00212             array(array('&nbsp;','dutyschedule-spacer')),
00213             $this->getTeamHeaders($teams)
00214         );
00215                 
00216         foreach ($events as $event) {
00217             $duty = $this->getSingleSchedule($event['uid']);
00218                         
00219             $cellData = $this->getEventInformation($event,$eventInfo);
00220             $cellData[] = array('&nbsp;','dutyschedule-spacer');
00221 
00222             //Set data for each cell/team
00223             foreach ($teams as $team) {
00224                 
00225                 $temp['duty'] = array();
00226                 
00227                 if (!is_array($duty[$team['uid']])) {
00228                     $temp['duty'][] = '&nbsp;';
00229                 } else {
00230                     
00231                     foreach ($duty[$team['uid']] as $key => $value) {
00232                         $temp['duty'][] = $team['members'][$value]['first_name'];
00233                     }
00234                 
00235                 }                   
00236                 
00237                 $cellData[] = array(
00238                     implode(', ',$temp['duty']),
00239                     $this->getCssClass($event['requiredteams'],$team),
00240                 );  
00241             }
00242             $data[] = $cellData;
00243         }
00244                 
00245         $content = $this->setData2Template($data);
00246         return $content;
00247     }
00248     
00256     function getCssClass($requiredTeams,$team) {
00257         $cssClass = 'dsc-normal';
00258         
00259         if (!is_array($requiredTeams)) {
00260             $requiredTeams = split(',',$requiredTeams);
00261         }
00262         
00263         if (!in_array($team['uid'],$requiredTeams)) {
00264             $cssClass = 'dsc-notneeded';
00265         }
00266         
00267         return $cssClass;
00268     }
00269     
00276     function setData2Template($data) {
00277         $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template,'###DUTYSCHEDULE###');
00278         $subparts = $this->getSubparts($template, array('###HEADERROW###','###DATAROW###','###HEADERCELL###','###DATACELL###'));
00279                 
00280         $tempData['header'] = $data[0];
00281         
00282         //SET HEADER-DATA
00283         foreach ($tempData['header'] as $headData) {
00284             $marker = array(
00285                 '###H_LABEL###' => $headData[0],
00286                 '###LABEL_CLASS###' => $headData[1],
00287             );
00288             $temp[] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($subparts['###HEADERCELL###'],$marker);
00289         }
00290         $temp['header'][] = implode('',$temp);
00291 
00292         unset($data[0]);
00293         
00294         //SET ROWS
00295         foreach ($data as $rowData) {
00296             
00297             //SET CELLS
00298             $temp['data'] = array();            
00299             foreach ($rowData as $cellData) {
00300                 $markers = array(
00301                     '###H_VALUE###' => $cellData[0],
00302                     '###VALUE_CLASS###' => $cellData[1],
00303                 );
00304                 $temp['data'][] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($subparts['###DATACELL###'],$markers); 
00305             }
00306             $temp['rows'][] = $this->cObj->substituteSubpart($subparts['###DATAROW###'],'###DATACELL###', implode('',$temp['data']));
00307         }
00308                         
00309         $subpartContent['###HEADERROW###'] = $this->cObj->substituteSubpart($subparts['###HEADERROW###'],'###HEADERCELL###', implode('', $temp['header']));
00310         $subpartContent['###DATAROW###'] = $this->cObj->substituteSubpart($subparts['###DATAROW###'],'###DATACELL###', implode('', $temp['rows']));
00311                             
00312         $content = $this->substituteMarkersAndSubparts($template,array(),$subpartContent);
00313         return $content;
00314     }
00315     
00321     function getEventHeaders() {
00322         $temp[] = array($this->pi_getLL('date'),'');
00323         $temp[] = array($this->pi_getLL('subject'),'');
00324         $temp[] = array($this->pi_getLL('notes'),'');
00325         return $temp;
00326     }
00327     
00335     function getTeamHeaders(&$teams) {
00336         $temp = array();
00337         if (is_array($teams)) {
00338             foreach ($teams as $key => $team) {
00339                 $name = empty($team['tx_servicemgr_dsname']) ? $team['title'] : $team['tx_servicemgr_dsname'];
00340                 $temp[] = array(str_replace(' ','&nbsp;',$name),'');
00341                 $teams[$key]['members'] = $this->getTeamMembers($team['uid']);
00342             }
00343         }
00344         return $temp;
00345     }
00346     
00354     function getEventInformation($event,$infos) {
00355         $event['datetime'] = date('d.m.Y', $event['datetime']);
00356         
00357         if (in_array('notes',$infos) && in_array('notes_internal',$infos)) { 
00358             if (!empty($event['notes'])) $event['notes'] .= '<br />'; 
00359             $event['notes'] .= $event['notes_internal'];
00360             unset($infos[array_search('notes_internal',$infos)]);
00361         }
00362         
00363         $temp = array();
00364         
00365         if (is_array($event) && is_array($infos)) {
00366             foreach ($infos as $info) {
00367                 $temp[] = array(empty($event[$info]) ? '&nbsp;' : $event[$info],'dsc-eventinfo');   
00368             }
00369         }
00370         
00371         return $temp;
00372     }

00381         switch ($submitType) {
00382             CASE 'personal':
00383                 
00384                 break;
00385             CASE 'team':
00386                 break;
00387             default:
00388         }
00389     }

00398     function getSubparts($template, $markerArray) {
00399         $content = array();
00400         foreach ($markerArray as $marker) {
00401             $content[$marker] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template, $marker);
00402         }
00403         return $content;
00404     }
